snippet.title: Call of Duty 4 "SPi's Nightmare" Mission
snippet.description:
Welcome to a very special mission for Call of Duty 4.
This is a mysterious and surreal mission that is directly linked to "Rooftops" Campaign and the Spec-Ops serries as well as Rooftops 2.

In this mission you are supposed to live a nightmare as the title indicates. There are a lot of surreal stuff going on like portal teleportation, thunder spawning enemies, visions dark depth of field and defocus and many more.

DOWNLOAD SPI'S NIGHTMARE MISSION:
MEDIAFIRE: http://www.mediafire.com/file/9h34me5zerwvnzw/COD4+-+SPi%27s+Nightmare.rar
MODDB: https://www.moddb.com/mods/spis-nightmare/downloads/spis-nightmare

Join my Discord Server related to my projects:
https://discord.gg/Rs68sr4

Watch COD4 "Rooftops" Campaign Walkthrough:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nau7m3I4ksE
(Or download from the links in the description of the above video link)

COD4: Spec-Ops Serries Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfPZdzppHBCoARYTm2f70-9d5enfyIWlK
(Each Mission's download link is in the description)
(They will all soon be joined in one mod)

Other Links:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/cod4-rooftops-2-red-alert
